knimeNode.name: GoogleAudit
knimeNode.shortDescription: Google Audit Adapter. ImpressiveCode DePress Plugin Framework.

intro.p: This node can be used to read data from Google Code Pro AnalytiX Audit report (XML format).

Google Code Pro AnalytiX Audit is set of dynamic, extensible tools that detect, report and repair deviations or non-compliance with predefined coding standards, popular frameworks, security and style conventions.

The report must be generated using Audit Code from Code Pro Tools: Source tree and choosing export to a xml file after right click on one of the results (Group by Severity perspective). For further information about report generation please refer to Google Audit documentation here.

fullDescription.option: Enter a valid file. When you press ENTER, the file is analyzed and the settings pre-set. You can also choose a previously read file from the drop-down list, or select a file from the "Browse..." dialog.

ports.outPort: Datatable just read from the Google Audit file grouped by severity.
